name: UnifiedAttribute
description: A unified attribute for the Checkboxgrid

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the button
default: 150.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the button
default: 150.0

content.name: x_count
content.description:
the number of checkbox columns
default: 5

content.name: y_count
content.description:
the number of checkbox rows
default: 5

content.name: check_mark_percentage_size
content.description:
the size of the check rectangles as a percentage of the overall checkbox size
default: 0.9

content.name: style__check
content.description:
the style of the checkbox check mark when it is checked
default: {r:0.58, g:0.58, b:0.58, a:1.0}

content.name: style__uncheck
content.description:
the style of the checkbox check mark when it is not checked
default: {r:0.0, g:0.0, b:0.0, a:0.0}

content.name: style__backing
content.description:
the style of the checkbox background rectangle
default: {r:0.78, g:0.78, b:0.78, a:1.0}

content.name: style__check_glow
content.description:
the style of the checkbox check mark when it is checked and glowing
default: {r:0.86, g:0.86, b:0.86, a:1.0}

content.name: style__uncheck_glow
content.description:
the style of the checkbox check mark when it is not checked and glowing
default: {r:0.0, g:0.0, b:0.0, a:0.0}

content.name: style__backing_glow
content.description:
the style of the checkbox background rectangle when glowing
default: {r:0.86, g:0.86, b:0.86, a:1.0}
